Story:
You look around and see some soldiers of the monarchy walking towards you. You have noticed that on that first moment they were focused on seeking and capturing other rebels and none of them have realized the dead officer\'s body in front of you.

Referring_Decision: You gO TO HOME AND FIGHT WITH OFFICER TO REMOVE IDENTITIES
Story:
The officer pulls out his sword and threatens to kill you if you don\'t listen to his commands. He asks you to prove your loyalty to the monarchy, by giving away the identities of the insurgents. Your senses are heightened by your fear and adrenaline and you notice a smelting rod on the ground.
Tell the officer their identities.
AND YOU SLOWLY MOVE TOWARDS THE ROD.YOU TAKE THAT ROD AND HIT THAT OFFICER HE FELL DOWN.THEN YOU RUN AWAY FROM YOUR HOME AND DISAPPEARANCE INTO FOREST.NOW YOU REALIZE, ALL THE IDENTITIES YOU LEAVE FROM HOME
 You gO TO HOME AND FIGHT WITH OFFICER TO REMOVE IDENTITIES
